oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Poetry Out Loud - 2018-03-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance program titled Poetry Out Loud. A competition of Tennessee school students to select the student to represent the state of Tennessee in the National Poetry Out Loud competition. Event held in the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 11, 2018. Hosted by Mickey Guyton.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mickey Guyton; Giri Peters; Uma Peters;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Walk-in music / (07:30) Opening comments by Ali Tonn / (10:00) Comments by Tennessee Arts Commissioner Ritchie Bowden / (12:06) Introduction of Master of Ceremonies Mickey Guyton / 13:45 Opening comments by Mickey Guyton / (14:07) Mickey performs the song Nice Things / (17:49) Introduces the next song / (18:06) Performs Better Than You Left Me (Mickey Guyton) / (22:12) Talks about the program / (22:48) Introduction of Giri and Uma Peters as the house band / (23:17) Introduction of the judges / (24:30) Talks about the structure of the competition and the scoring / (26:09) Performance of The Charge Of The Light Brigade (Brittany Wilkerson) / (27:51) Performance of Unidentified Song (Giri and Uma Peters) / (28:52) Performance of Discrimination (Jerry Ruiz) / (30:20) Performance of Soldier's Joy (Giri and Uma Peters) / Performance of The Cross Of Snow (Preston Cate) / (32:24) Perform Pretty Little Miss (Giri and Uma Peters) /

(33:11) Performance of A Noiseless Patient Spider (Rebecca Fitts) /(34:20) Performance of Going Round This World, Baby Mine (Giri and Uma Peters) / (35:01) Performance of Possible Risking Absurdity #15 (Grayson Brawner) / (36:44) Performance of Unidentified Song (Giri and Uma Peters) / (37:23) Performance of The Date (Reuben Savage) / (38:26) Performance of unknown instrumental-same as song found at 27:51 (Giri and Uma Peters) / (39:10) Performance of And If I Did, What Then (Alyvia Crawley) / (40:43) Performance of Soldier's Joy (Giri and Uma Peters) / (41:26) Performance of Self Portrait (Mollie Reed) / (42:33) Performance of White Freightliner Blues (Geri and Uma Peters) / (43:15) Performance of Enough (Massai Twitty) / (44:30) Performance of Pretty Little Miss (Giri and Uma Peters) / (45:17) Performance of I Go Back To May 1937 (Shane Embury) / (47:18) Performance of Going Round This World Baby Mine (Giri and Uma Peters) / (48:00) Performance of When You Are Old (Tucker Greene) /
